input.sentences: we saw a lovely building with yellow paint .
the target in the center was red and brown .
the office was full of old equipment .
the office was also spacious and free .
output.sentences: On my way home after a long hard day I noted that the water in the harbor looked especially refreshing.
The yellow paint on the nearby sports arena seemed particularly lovely.
I had spent the entire day examing a red target center that was important to our company's new project, so it seemed anything no-work related was suddenly extra woderful to me.
Our office at work has the latest equipment, but once I got home I was happy to hang with my own laptop and low-tech gear.
My home office is not spacious, but it's free from intrusions and that is enough for me.
